message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product and I think it would be a great fit for you. I'm offering it to you for $100.  Let me know what you think!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Can you meet me in the middle?
Hey Bob, thanks for the counteroffer. I appreciate your interest!  I'm willing to come down a bit to $95,  which is right in the middle of our positions.  What do you say?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate! However, I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $85?
